short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to view the AES all-school calendar quickly, right from the browser tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension allows users to view the AES all-school calendar by clicking its icon from the browser, without the need of visiting AES website or following bookmarked links.
